name: @lucidweb/retro-webxr
description: A small layer to maintain backward compatibility of old projects in case of WebVR/WebXR API changes.

scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified" && echo "If you want to help, please make a PR at https://github.com/LucidWebBVBA/webxr-compatibility-layer" && exit 1
